comment: Primary Key for the EPISODE table.

description: Unique identifier for the person associated with the episode.
Concept representing the kind of abstraction related to the disease phase, outcome, or treatment.
Identifier for the parent episode that subsumes the given episode (nested episodes).
Sequence number indicating the order of episodes, e.g., lines of treatment.
comment: Order of episodes in a sequence.

description: Standard Concept representing the disease phase, outcome, or abstraction of the episode.
Concept ID representing the provenance of the episode record (e.g., EHR, claims).
Source code for the episode as it appears in the source data.
Concept representing the code used in the source for the episode.
